data.actual_result: Discord throws an Uncaught Error in the console
data.expected_result: No error is produced in the console
data.short_description: Highlighting an uploaded image/gif and dragging it so it goes outside of the app and then dragging it back in and releasing, will throw an Uncaught Error in the console
data.steps_to_repro: - Open your console - Highlight an upload an image/gif - Then while holding your mouse drag it outside of Discord and back in then releasing it
